name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Helen WILLIAMS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Helen WILLIAMS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Lee M. Kaplan, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1156
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Helen WILLIAMS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 17, 1980.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Harry Siegel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Lee M. Kaplan, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
